message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $600000. Considering the product's unique features and my initial offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll counteroffer at $700000. I believe this is a more reasonable compromise.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, so I'll counteroffer at $650000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market.
